name: Sonic Sloth
text: If you activate the effect of a "Sonic" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Sonic Duck" from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Sonic" monster from your Deck, but its effects are negated, and its banished when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Sonic Sloth" once per turn.
